thread.title: Travis Scott Falls Through Stage At Drake Show & Drake Refunds The Whole Damn Crowd
thread.title_full: Travis Scott Falls Through Stage At Drake Show & Drake Refunds The Whole Damn Crowd

author: Somhairle Cinnsealach
title: Travis Scott Falls Through Stage At Drake Show & Drake Refunds The Whole Damn Crowd

organizations.name: travis scott falls through stage at drake show & drake

text:
A photo posted by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Feb 1, 2017 at 5:14pm PST 0 
London, UK ‚Äì When performing with Drake last night in London‚Äôs O2 Arena, special guest Travis Scott fell victim to some elaborate set design. While exploring the stage, Scott took a tumble down a hole where a ‚Äúlight-up globe‚Äù set decoration is kept. Many captured the fall on video, and it honestly looks like Scott gets pulled into another dimension. travis scott casually falls in a hole 
drake: "that's turnt" pic.twitter.com/3gEErTYriy Close up of Travis falling in the hole at Drake's tour üòÇ 
Drake: That's turnt! pic.twitter.com/adMtgsUGu2 
‚Äî travis scott fanpage (@YamzInTheTrap) February 2, 2017 
What‚Äôs more remarkable is that Drake doesn‚Äôt even seem to realize what has happened at first, and continues to ad-lib, shouting ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs turnt!‚Äù into the mic seconds after Travis Scott has vanished. ‚ÄúTurnt‚Äù is one word for it. 
Luckily, it doesn‚Äôt seem like Scott was bothered by the incident. He was on Twitter hours later posting about how much he enjoyed London, and agreeing with Drizzy‚Äôs assessment of the situation: ‚ÄúBy far one of the most turnt and epic shit ever fuck.‚Äù The shit was fun london is wild 
‚Äî TRAVIS SCOTT (@trvisXX) February 1, 2017 By far one of the most turnt and epic shit ever fuck 
‚Äî TRAVIS SCOTT (@trvisXX) February 2, 2017 
The fall caused some technical difficulties and a pause in the show, prompting Drake to announce to a delighted crowd that he‚Äôd be refunding the tickets ‚Äì though it remains to be seen whether people get their money back. International Business Times reports that the Canadian rapper said: 
‚ÄúI‚Äôm doing this shit for free tonight, I don‚Äôt give a fuck. Because, you know what? It‚Äôs real love in here tonight. I don‚Äôt give a fuck about none of these people fucking up. I‚Äôm giving all their shit back. London England, I love you, I hope you enjoyed your free show!‚Äù The moment after Drake told everyone is getting a refund üôåüèΩ pic.twitter.com/7FiFYjSsQV
